original_text: When Joseph had buried his father, he returned to Egypt together with his brothers. Everyone who had gone to Canaan with him also returned to Egypt.
korean_text: 요셉이 아버지를 장사한 후에 자기 형제와 호상꾼과 함께 애굽으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: When Joseph had buried his father
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉이 그의 아버지를 장사 지냈을 때

sentences.original_text: Everyone who had gone to Canaan with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 가나안으로 갔던 모든 사람은
